column4: BRIEF-Microsoft announces debt offering of $19.75 bln
column5: * Announced pricing of its offering of $19.75 billion aggregate principal amount of senior unsecured notes  Source text for Eikon:  Further company coverage:    (Bengaluru Newsroom: +1 646 223 8780)

column4: Musk  big investors likely to boost stakes in Tesla
column5: DETROIT Elon Musk and key institutional investors will probably tighten their control over electric car maker Tesla Motors Inc  after it acquires sister company SolarCity Inc   a Reuters analysis shows.

column4: Musk  big investors likely to boost stakes in Tesla
